column5: I have been keeping my eye on this GPS as it is one of the best ones out there and this is certainly the best price I have seen.  ...at $339 it's a steal!  http://radioworld.ca/product_info.php?cPat...products_id=804  Cheers! Tony

Great price, Tony!  It's even a few bucks cheaper than out of GPS  city in Alberta, with no PST.  This gps is highly recommended, friends.  Get a 2 gb storage card and put the whole topo map of Canada on your handheld.  Amazing sensitivity too.
